floyd,
=A0
This same spirit once shouted me out=A0while I was in my daily=
=A0meditation, so out loud that I thought she was a neighbour, then I could=
 hear also=A0her steps outside the room, then I began to realize that the s=
teps never=A0fade out,=A0I didn't panick cause I thought it was my neighbou=
r, but when I realized that it was not, immediately my guide appeared to me=
 in a light form, and told me (telepathically)=A0not to be afraid, so I did=
 that, then ignored all the thing, this was almost 4 years ago,=A0 but I th=
ink these communications are from the same entity, its a woman, I don't thi=
nk that if I talk to her, she would change her ill-=A0humor, what about if =
she wants attention just to get in and then I wouldn't be able to put her o=
ut?
=A0
Could it be a mental projection of a living person ? I can't unders=
tand why a spirit can be so envious, when she shouted me while in meditatio=
n, she said "YOU SHUT UP NOW"=A0 very strongly and in a very bad humor. Whe=
n this happened I was gonna tell her "go to the hell" cause I thought it wa=
s my neighbour, once that I proved that it was not,=A0 I couldn't understan=
d how come a spirit could yell so loud, but I never got scared, I was ready=
 to fight back.
=A0
But one must not follow their games, cause these kind o=
f=A0spirits want to bother, and protectors or guides most be called in, to =
protect the meditation or the EVP.
=A0
How can we know that they have good =
intentions? of course we can feel some of them, but not all, some can disgu=
ise themselves, I suppose.
=A0
In the EVPs I ignored her, but I think she w=
ants to catch some attention, but I can't trust her, even if she change her=
 attitude. Spirits can be sometimes very tricky.
=A0
Intuition can help us =
very much in these cases, but not always.
=A0
Neli
=A0


      
--0-2092287363-1227599639=:65919
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>floyd,</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>This same spirit once shouted me out while I was in my daily meditation, so out loud that I thought she was a neighbour, then I could hear also her steps outside the room, then I began to realize that the steps never fade out, I didn't panick cause I thought it was my neighbour, but when I realized that it was not, immediately my guide appeared to me in a light form, and told me (telepathically) not to be afraid, so I did that, then ignored all the thing, this was almost 4 years ago,  but I think these communications are from the same entity, its a woman, I don't think that if I talk to her, she would change her ill- humor, what about if she wants attention just to get in and then I wouldn't be able to put her out?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Could it be a mental projection of a living person ? I can't understand why a spirit can be so envious, when she shouted me while in meditation, she said "YOU SHUT UP NOW"  very strongly and in a very bad humor. When this happened I was gonna tell her "go to the hell" cause I thought it was my neighbour, once that I proved that it was not,  I couldn't understand how come a spirit could yell so loud, but I never got scared, I was ready to fight back.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>But one must not follow their games, cause these kind of spirits want to bother, and protectors or guides most be called in, to protect the meditation or the EVP.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>How can we know that they have good intentions? of course we can feel some of them, but not all, some can disguise themselves, I suppose.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>In the EVPs I ignored her, but I think she wants to catch some attention, but I can't trust her, even if she change her attitude. Spirits can be sometimes very tricky.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Intuition can help us very much in these cases, but not always.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Neli</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV></td></tr></table><br>
